name: Effigies
description:
The project "Effigies" is my entry for the 43th LudumDare session. As usual, I did a puzzle game. Use arrows key to move Amulets - each of them must be on its colored base (red, green and blue). This game is really hard and each movement must be considered. Be careful - snakes hurt you! I guess that players have to do many efforts to finish the entirely game - sacrifices must be made :)

USE ARROWS KEYS TO MOVE EFFIGIES

ESCAPE TO GO BACK - TO THE MENU

R TO RESTART A LEVEL ++
